bibl.title: The Oasis Papers 2. Proceedings of the Second International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project. (Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 12.)
bibl.note: 14 communications and 4 abstracts. - Pp. v: A.J. MILLS, Dedication to the memory of Geoffrey E. Freeman († 2001); - vii: M.F.W., Editor's Preface. - Palaeoenvironment. - Prehistory. - Historical Archaeology. - Conservation. - Abstracts.

WISEMAN Marcia F. (Edited by) and Bruce E. PARR (Production Editor), The Oasis Papers 2. Proceedings of the Second International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project. (Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 12.)
Oxford, Oxbow Books, 2008, 4°, xii-160 pp., tabl., graphiques, figg., plans, pll. ISBN 978-1-84217-127-1. £40.
